attributes.action: Reduce the use of nuclear energy in the UK
attributes.additional_details: It also takes up a vast amount of space and that can affect people's living space and our environments' animals. It is also a high level of pollution  to our earth's air and that creates the melting of our ice caps which is a problem that is being addressed.
attributes.background: There are numerous amounts of nuclear power plants around the UK. These are one of the causes of cancer around the globe and It is also the most toxic waste to the ocean. Therefore we want to prevent our ocean becoming toxic and more people getting cancer due to the activation of their cancer cells.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly whether you'd like to stop building new nuclear power stations or no longer use exisiting generators. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
